tc_payload module¶

This module is part of the nmeta suite running on top of Ryu SDN controller to provide network identity and flow (traffic classification) metadata

class tc_payload.PayloadInspect(_config)¶

Bases: object

This class is instantiated by tc_policy.py (class: TrafficClassificationPolicy) and provides methods to run payload traffic classification matches

check_payload(policy_attr, policy_value, pkt)¶

Passed a payload classification attribute, value and packet and return a dictionary containing attributes ‘match’ and ‘continue_to_inspect’ with appropriate values set.

maintain_fcip_table(max_age_fcip)¶

Deletes old entries from FCIP table This function is passed maximum age value and deletes any entries in the table that have a time_last that is older than that when compared to current time
